import React from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' function Article() { let {handleSubmit,register}=useForm() let {currentUser,usertype}=useSelector(state=>state.userAuthorReducer) let {state}=useLocation() function writeComment(obj){ console.log(obj) } return (

{state.title}

Created On: {state.dateOfCreation}
Modified On: {state.dateOfModification}
{currentUser.userType === "author" && ( <> )}

)}
) } export default Article
